name: Forgettable Encounter Gaiden
description:
Controls:

D-pad : Arrow keys, WADS

Start : Enter

A button : z

Second prototype for a Fire Emblem type game. I'm still trying to perfect the grid based movement, so there are no battles this time. There ARE two different game types that control slightly differently. When you get bored with one, press start to reset the game and try the other.

I'm still not sure if this will turn into anything more ambitious, but it's helped me figure out some things in GB Studio.
